info.title: FWBer API Documentation
info.description: Comprehensive API documentation for FWBer - A proximity-based dating platform with real-time features, AI-powered matching, and privacy-first design.

get.description: Get comprehensive analytics data
Get real-time metrics
Get moderation insights

get.summary: List groups the authenticated user belongs to
get.description: List user's groups

post.description: Create a new group

get.description: Get group details

post.description: Join a group
Leave a group

400.description: Not a member or owner cannot leave

post.description: Set member role (owner can set any non-owner; admin can set moderator/member)

400.description: Cannot change owner role or invalid assignment

post.description: Transfer ownership to another active member

400.description: Target not active member or already owner

post.description: Ban a member (owner/admin). Banned members are deactivated and cannot rejoin until unbanned.
Unban a member (owner/admin)
Mute a member temporarily (owner/admin). Accepts either duration_minutes or until timestamp.
Unmute a member.

get.description: Simple analytics endpoint for group (owner/admin only).

post.description: Kick a member (owner/admin). Makes member inactive but not banned.

get.description: Discover public groups
Get messages for a group

post.summary: Send a message to a group
post.description: Send a message to a group
Mark message as read (idempotent)

get.description: Get unread message count across all user's groups

post.description: Send a text message or media (image/video/audio/file) to a matched user. Either content or media is required. Enforces relationship tier limits and blocks.

get.summary: Get conversation with a matched user
get.description: Returns paginated messages and other user's presence info.

post.description: Mark message as read

get.description: Get unread message count
Get tier progress for a specific match
Get photos for a match based on current tier
Get the authenticated user's physical profile

put.description: Create or update the authenticated user's physical profile

post.description: Request avatar generation using the saved avatar_prompt
Create a new user account with email, password, and optional profile information. Automatically generates API token for immediate authentication.
Authenticate user with email and password. Returns API token for subsequent requests.
Revoke current API token and end user session

get.description: Get bulletin boards near a location

post.summary: Create or find a board for a location

get.description: Get a specific bulletin board with messages
Get messages for a bulletin board (with pagination)

post.description: AI-generated profile bio, about section, and interests based on user preferences
AI-generated post ideas for a bulletin board based on context
AI-generated conversation openers based on context and match data
AI-powered content optimization for engagement, clarity, safety, and relevance

get.description: Retrieve statistics about AI content generation usage and performance
Retrieve statistics about content optimization usage and improvements

post.description: Provide feedback on AI-generated content to improve future suggestions

get.description: Retrieve user's AI content generation history with pagination
Retrieve comprehensive statistics for the authenticated user including matches, conversations, profile views, and engagement metrics
Retrieve a unified activity feed showing recent matches, messages, and profile views

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of activity items to return

match_score.description: Only present for match type activities

get.description: Calculate profile completion percentage and identify missing required/optional fields for the authenticated user
Checks database, Redis, cache, storage and queue configuration. Returns 503 if any critical service is down.
Returns 200 when the application process is alive.
Checks critical dependencies and returns 200 when the service is ready to receive traffic.
Get current user's location

post.description: Updates the authenticated user's current location and privacy level.

get.description: Finds nearby users within a radius considering privacy settings.
Retrieve a feed of potential matches based on user preferences, location, and filters. Results are cached for 60 seconds per user.

message.example: Profile not found. Please complete your profile first.

post.description: Like, pass, or super like a potential match. Returns whether action resulted in a mutual match.

400.description: Invalid action or user not accessible

get.description: Set an authorization cookie for subscribing to Mercure SSE topics
Check current Mercure authorization status and available topics
Get moderation dashboard overview.
Get flagged content for review.

post.description: Review and take action on flagged content.

get.description: Get suspicious geo-spoof detections.

post.description: Review geo-spoof detection.

get.description: Get active shadow throttles.
Get moderation action history.
Get user moderation profile.

photo.description: Image file (JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP, max 5MB)

post.description: Reorder photos

get.description: Retrieve complete profile information for the authenticated user including preferences, location, and completion status

message.example: Profile not found. Please complete your profile.

put.description: Update profile information including bio, preferences, location, and personal details. All fields are optional.

post.description: Track when a user views another user's profile (with 24-hour deduplication). Anonymous views are tracked by IP address. Returns one of three possible messages: 'Profile view recorded' (new view), 'View already recorded' (duplicate within 24h), or 'Cannot view own profile' (self-view blocked).

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user whose profile is being viewed

200.description: Operation completed (see message field for details)

get.description: Retrieve list of authenticated users who have viewed the profile (last 50 views, excludes anonymous views)

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user whose profile views to retrieve

403.description: Unauthorized to view other user's profile views

get.description: Retrieve aggregated profile view analytics including total, daily, weekly, and monthly views plus unique viewer count

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user whose view statistics to retrieve

403.description: Unauthorized to view other user's statistics

get.summary: Local Pulse: ephemeral content + nearby matches
get.description:
Local Pulse - Merged feed of proximity artifacts + nearby match candidates
This combines the draw of hyperlocal ephemeral content with mutual-match discovery
Find nearby proximity chatrooms

parameters.description: Maximum number of recommendations to return
